item.title: Interactive Maps in R: Maryland Vehicle Crashes
item.description: Creating interactive maps might seems a pretty complex task, that would require deep knowledge of JavaScript and quite some coding. Luckily, the package leaflet allows R users of taking advantage of the homonym JavaScript library to create interactive maps in just 3 lines of code. Let’s look at the vehicle crashes in Maryland in 2019 with an interactive map!
